reviewText: my daughter loves this show a lot its her #1 show of all times

Blu-ray as it should be.  Finished watching first season.  Picture is clear and sharp.  No issues because of the age of the original.  Will definitely order additional seasons as they are released.  Very happy with this purchase.

I watched this series for the first time a couple years ago and took an immediate liking to it. This arrived in perfect condition and pretty quick too. I thought this season was really funny and I knew I just had to buy it. I've always liked Don Johnson as an actor and Cheech Marin is hilarious! The two of them are fantastic in this series. I can't wait to get the second season.
Love the show, but not having a play all option is a deal breaker for me!
Love this series and the supplier was great

Bought this and got through the first DVD but after the second episode on the second DVD, every time I selected a different episode it would play the same episode....no matter if I went to the scene selection menu and chose an episode

I loved the original series and was looking forward to fun nostalgia.  I still like the characters, setting and story lines.  It's also fun to see the range of guest stars that crop up along the way.  Unfortunately the transfer needs to be updated as it is dark and color and contrast are poor.
